verses.verse: <S%H87>Abram<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H802>he,<s%> his wife, all that he <S%H3876>had,<s%> and Lot with <S%H5045>him,<s%> into the South.

He <S%H3212>went<s%> on his <S%H4550>journeys<s%> from the <S%H5045>South<s%> even to <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> where his <S%H168>tent<s%> had <S%H1961>been<s%> at the <S%H8462>beginning,<s%> between <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai,<s%>

to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made<s%> there at the <S%H7223>first.<s%> There <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H776>land<s%> was not able to <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H3427>them,<s%> that they might live <S%H3162>together:<s%> for their <S%H7399>substance<s%> was <S%H7227>great,<s%> so that they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

There was a <S%H7379>strife<s%> between the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> of <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%>'s <S%H4735>livestock:<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the land at that <S%H776>time.<s%>

<S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> <S%H1961>"Please,<s%> let there be <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H4808>strife<s%> between me and <S%H7462>you,<s%> and between my herdsmen and your <S%H7462>herdsmen;<s%> for <S%H582>we<s%> are <S%H251>relatives.<s%>

<S%H776>Isn't<s%> the whole land before <S%H6440>you?<s%> Please separate <S%H6504>yourself<s%> from <S%H8040>me.<s%> If you go to the left hand, then I will go to the <S%H3231>right.<s%> Or if you go to the right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> then I will go to the <S%H8041>left.<s%>"

<S%H3876>Lot<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> all the <S%H3603>plain<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that it was <S%H4945>well-watered<s%> <S%H6440>everywhere,<s%> before <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> like the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> like the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> as you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H6820>Zoar.<s%>

So <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> the <S%H3603>Plain<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> for <S%H3876>himself.<s%> Lot <S%H5265>traveled<s%> <S%H6924>east,<s%> and they separated <S%H6504>themselves<s%> the <S%H376>one<s%> from the <S%H251>other.<s%>

<S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3603>plain,<s%> and moved his <S%H167>tent<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H5467>Sodom.<s%>
Now the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> were <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H7451>wicked<s%> and <S%H2400>sinners<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> was <S%H6504>separated<s%> from <S%H5375>him,<s%> "Now, lift up your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>look<s%> from the <S%H4725>place<s%> where you <S%H6828>are,<s%> northward and <S%H5045>southward<s%> and <S%H6924>eastward<s%> and <S%H3220>westward,<s%>
for all the <S%H776>land<s%> which you <S%H7200>see,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H5704>you,<s%> and to your <S%H2233>offspring<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H2233>offspring<s%> as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> so <S%H834>that<s%> if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H4487>number<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> then your <S%H2233>seed<s%> may also be <S%H4487>numbered.<s%>
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> in its <S%H753>length<s%> and in its <S%H7341>breadth;<s%> for I will give it to <S%H5414>you.<s%>"

<S%H87>Abram<s%> moved his <S%H167>tent,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> by the <S%H436>oaks<s%> of <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> which are in <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> there to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
